Phase 1

  • Satoshi Nakamoto began working on the Bitcoin concept.

Ocean and Seas Collection

AI genereted ocean NFTs, with profits donated towards ocean waste removal and the Eco Planet Impact Fund.

EcoPlanet Token.

An eco-friendly form of paying, donating, or investing. Developed on the Solana blockchain with a percentage donated towards the environmental causes.

Phase 2

Nature and Trees Collection

AI genereted nature NFTs, with profits donated towards planting trees and the Eco Planet Impact Fund.

EcoPlanet NFT Fundraising platform

This platform will be an incubator for sustainable startups to raise funds and build a network using web 3 innovations.

Phase 3

Coral Reefs Collection

AI generated coral NFTs, with profits donated towards rebuilding coral gardens and the Eco Planet Impact Fund

EcoPlanet Proof-to-earn

Airdrops will be released as a form of rewards from proving a positive impact on the environment.

Phase 4

Endangered Animal Collection

AI generated Animal NFTs, with profits donated towards animal rehabilitation and the Eco Planet Impact Fund.

Develop EcoPlanet Blockchain available as public ledger or ecoplanet transactions fully powered by sustainable energy.
